tooltip.mcrgb.always_show_in_tooltips: Controls whether color info is displayed in item tooltips outside of the color picker UI.
tooltip.mcrgb.slider_constant_update: Set this to 'Update After Scrolling' if you experience stuttering/lag while using RGB sliders.
warning.mcrgb.noclothconfig: Cloth Config is required to access settings in-game. Edit the config.json manually or install Cloth Config.
